name: Royal Flush (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, if you control "Queen's Knight", you can pay 1000 LP to Normal Summon 1 "King's Knight" in addition to your Normal Summon or Set.
"King's Knight" and "Jack's Knight" you control cannot attack directly the turn you use this Skill.
